quote-source: Jim Edwards, Ugandan stamp plant identification mystery, Taxacom mailing list, May 31, 2013.
quote-text: Uganda puts out a lot of showy stamps aimed at stamp collectors. […] other Ugandan sets include homages to the movies Toy Story and The Lion King, sets for Mickey Mouse and Goofy, and, in 2012, three very elaborate issues for the 35th anniversary of the death of Elvis Presley.
